text: "Love Her Madly" is a 1971 song by The Doors. It is the leading single from their sixth studio album L.A. Woman. It went to number 6 in Australia, number 4 in the Netherlands, number 3 in Canada and number 11 in the United States. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:The Doors songs
title: Love Her Madly
